summary: Login page 500 error with percent sign
description: The login screen gives me a 500 server error if I use a password with a percent sign in it. Specifically, the character '%' causes a crash.

summary: Database timing out at 9am UTC
description: The Postgres database is timing out every morning during peak traffic hours. This happens at 9 AM UTC daily.

summary: Typo in the Terms of Service footer link
description: The link says 'Term of Sevice' instead of 'Terms of Service'.

summary: API returns 404 for valid user IDs in the /users endpoint
description: GET /users/{id} returns 404 even for users that definitely exist in the DB.

summary: Android app freezes on splash screen
description: On Pixel 6 devices running Android 13, the app hangs indefinitely on startup.

summary: Search filters are not applying correctly
description: Selecting 'Price: Low to High' does not reorder the product list.

summary: AWS Lambda function memory limit exceeded
description: The image processing lambda crashes with OOM errors on large files.

summary: Dark mode toggle resets on page refresh
description: User preference for dark mode is not saved to local storage.

summary: Stripe declining Canadian credit cards
description: Stripe is declining all credit card payments from Canadian customers with a generic decline error for all CAD cards.

summary: User profile image upload fails silently
description: Uploading a PNG works, but JPEGs fail without any error message to the user.

summary: CI/CD pipeline fails on integration tests step
description: The GitHub Action runner times out waiting for the test database container.

summary: Forgot Password email never arrives
description: Users report not receiving the reset link. SendGrid logs show 'Dropped'.

summary: Dashboard widgets overlap on mobile view
description: On screens smaller than 375px wide, the graph widget covers the metrics cards.

summary: Double charge on Pay button double click
description: Users are double charging themselves by clicking the pay button twice. The button needs to be disabled after the first click.

summary: Export to CSV feature downloads empty file
description: The reporting module generates a 0kb CSV file regardless of date range selected.

summary: Redis cache keys not expiring
description: Old session data is persisting in Redis indefinitely, causing memory bloat.

summary: iOS App crash on push notification
description: The iOS app immediately crashes when the user taps on a push notification. Affects iOS 16 users.

summary: Product description text is cut off
description: Descriptions longer than 200 chars are truncated without a 'Read More' link.

summary: Admin panel slow to load user list
description: Loading the user table takes >15 seconds due to lack of pagination.

summary: GraphQL query returns internal server error on nested fields
description: Querying user -> posts -> comments -> author throws 500.

summary: Sidebar navigation missing icons in Safari
description: SVG icons do not render in the sidebar on Safari v15.

summary: ElasticSearch indexing lag
description: New products take up to an hour to appear in search results.

summary: JWT token expiration time is too short
description: Tokens expire after 5 minutes, forcing frequent re-logins.

summary: Cart total calculation incorrect for discounted items
description: Items with a 10% discount are being calculated at full price in the final total.

summary: 403 Forbidden on public API documentation
description: The /docs endpoint is prompting for basic auth unexpectedly.

summary: Video player controls unresponsive on Firefox
description: Play/Pause buttons do nothing on Firefox Quantum.

summary: User settings page throws React hydration error
description: Console shows hydration mismatch error on /settings/profile.

summary: Docker build fails due to missing dependency
description: Build fails at 'pip install -r requirements.txt' looking for pandas version.

summary: Chat websocket disconnects frequently
description: Users are disconnected from chat every 2-3 minutes.

summary: Incorrect currency symbol for JPY
description: Japanese Yen is showing as '$' instead of 'Â¥'.

summary: Admin cannot delete banned users
description: Delete button is disabled for users with 'Banned' status.

summary: Memory leak in Node.js service
description: RSS memory usage grows linearly until crash every 48 hours.

summary: Email footer has broken unsubscribe link
description: Clicking unsubscribe leads to a 404 page.

summary: Inventory count goes negative
description: It is possible to purchase more items than are in stock, resulting in -1 inventory.

summary: Mobile menu button hard to click
description: Touch target for the hamburger menu is too small (20px).

summary: S3 bucket permissions too open
description: Security audit shows the 'uploads' bucket allows public write access.

summary: Date picker shows wrong day of week
description: Calendar component thinks Monday is Sunday.

summary: Slow query on 'Order History' page
description: Loading order history performs a full table scan.

summary: Avatar image aspect ratio distorted
description: Square images are being stretched into rectangles.

summary: 2FA SMS codes not delivered
description: Two-factor authentication SMS codes are not being delivered to users. No SMS is received even after waiting.

summary: Kubernetes pods stuck in Pending state
description: New deployments remain in Pending due to insufficient CPU.

summary: Translation missing for Spanish locale
description: Homepage displays translation keys like 'home.title' instead of text.

summary: File download filename is corrupted
description: Downloaded files have random characters in the filename.

summary: API rate limiter blocking legitimate traffic
description: Internal services are being rate limited by the gateway.

summary: Session cookies missing Secure flag
description: Cookies are being sent over non-HTTPS connections.

summary: Graph axis labels overlap
description: On the analytics page, the X-axis labels overlap when viewing monthly data.

summary: Refund webhook failing verification
description: Webhook signature verification fails for refund events only.

summary: User search case sensitive
description: Searching for 'john' does not find 'John'.

summary: Browser back button breaks SPA routing
description: Clicking back does not render the previous view in the React app.

summary: Log files consuming all disk space
description: App logs are not rotating, filling the 50GB disk in 2 days.
